definition: mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if

sentences.english: Global average temperature records are vital to understanding how the climate is changing.
sentences.chinese: 全球平均气温纪录对认识气候变化的过程至关重要。

sentences.english: And it is vital to the stability of the region.
sentences.chinese: 稳定对于这一国家而言是至关重要的。

sentences.english: Water itself is vital to the future of the race.
sentences.chinese: 水本身就是人类未来的至关重要的因素。

sentences.english: Continuous engineering research is quite important for scientific research institute.
sentences.chinese: 科学研究院所的继续工程教育至关重要。

sentences.english: The content of sulfated group in polysaccharides functions importantly on their biological activities.
sentences.chinese: 硫酸基含量对多糖的生物活性起着至关重要的作用。

sentences.english: Protection of your vibratory essence is vital.
sentences.chinese: 至关重要的是保护你们的振动精髓。

sentences.english: The discipline of ecology is essential for untangling these complexities.
sentences.chinese: 生态学对于解开这些复杂性至关重要。

sentences.english: These negotiations matter hugely for the peak-oil debate.
sentences.chinese: 关于气候变化的协商对石油峰值讨论至关重要。

sentences.english: So it is very important to detect the anti-seismic capability of building.
sentences.chinese: 所以对建筑物抗震能力进行检测至关重要。

sentences.english: The fourth Lateran Council, in 1215, was of crucial importance.
sentences.chinese: 第四次拉特兰会，在1215年，是至关重要的。

sentences.english: A standpipe was crucial for smooth circulation .
sentences.chinese: 一根立管对实现顺利循环至关重要。

sentences.english: In particular, the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act (FISA) is vital to the community's mission against terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 尤其外国信息监督法案对于智囊团反恐任务至关重要。

sentences.english: Changes with the ideas of consumption are the key to the successful popularization of green products.
sentences.chinese: 要成功地推行绿色产品，消费观念的改变至关重要。

sentences.english: And there's a lot of significance in that, I think, and I'll try to explain why.
sentences.chinese: 我认为这一点至关重要，我会告诉你们原因。

sentences.english: In this background, the institutionalization of research integrity becomes more important.
sentences.chinese: 在此背景下，研究诚信的体制化显得至关重要。

sentences.english: Flag issue is radical, and route issue is relating to overall phase.
sentences.chinese: 旗帜问题至关重要，道路问题事关全局。

definition: of the utmost importance/of highest priority
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
to act on/to affect/action/function/activity/impact/result/effect/purpose/intent/to play a role/corresponds to English -ity, -ism, -ization/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 必不可少[bi4 bu4 ke3 shao3]
it goes without saying/it is self-evident
